title: Chhandamtu chatuan nun nan
lyrics:
Chhandamtu, chatuan nun nan,
I hnenah awm reng hi ka duh e;
I thisenin min tleng la,
Kumkhuain min awmpui reng ang che.

Ni tinin, ni tinin i theihna lo hria ila,
I mi hmangaihna nem chua,
Min phuar nghet zel rawh Lalpa, Nang nen.

He khawvel dang zelah hian,
Ka kal chhungin min hruai zel langin;
Nang ringin ka bo lo vang,
Ka kawng pawh ka hloh thei tawh lo vang.

Nang hmangaih zual zel ila,
He ka dma chhugn rei lo teah hian;
Ka nunna van engmawian,
Hmangaihin a chim pil hma loh chuan.
